title: Task 1: The Comm Tower
subtitle: Easy — Arrays
description: Given an array of N integers, return the sum of all even numbers in the array.
input_format:
Line 1: Integer N
Line 2: N space-separated integers
output_format: A single integer — the sum of all even numbers.

hidden_main.python:
import sys
def main():
    data = sys.stdin.read().split()
    n = int(data[0])
    arr = list(map(int, data[1:n+1]))
    print(f'RESULT:{sum_even(arr)}')
main()

title: Task 2: The Reactor Meltdown
subtitle: Easy — Strings
constraints: 1 ≤ |s| ≤ 10⁵  |  s contains only lowercase English letters

hidden_main.python:
import sys
def main():
    s = sys.stdin.read().strip()
    print(f'RESULT:{reverse_string(s)}')
main()

title: Task 3: The Vent Network
subtitle: Medium — Stack
description: Given an integer N, return the factorial of N. Since the answer can be large, return it modulo 10⁹+7.

hidden_main.python:
import sys
def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.read().strip())
    print(f'RESULT:{factorial(n)}')
main()

title: Task 4: The O2 Sabotage
subtitle: Medium — Trees
description: Given two integers A and B, return their Greatest Common Divisor (GCD).
input_format: Line 1: Two space-separated integers A and B

hidden_main.python:
import sys
def main():
    data = sys.stdin.read().split()
    a, b = int(data[0]), int(data[1])
    print(f'RESULT:{gcd(a, b)}')
main()

title: Task 5: The Meeting Room
subtitle: Hard — Graphs
description: Given a sorted array of N integers and a target value, return the index of the target using binary search. If not found, return -1.
input_format:
Line 1: Two integers N and target
Line 2: N sorted space-separated integers
output_format: A single integer — index of target, or -1.
constraints: 1 ≤ N ≤ 10⁶  |  -10⁹ ≤ arr[i], target ≤ 10⁹  |  Array is sorted in ascending order

hidden_main.python:
import sys
def main():
    data = sys.stdin.read().split()
    n, target = int(data[0]), int(data[1])
    arr = list(map(int, data[2:n+2]))
    print(f'RESULT:{binary_search(arr, target)}')
main()

title: Task 6: Emergency Meeting
subtitle: Hard — Dynamic Programming
description: Given N, return the Nth Fibonacci number. F(0)=0, F(1)=1, F(N)=F(N-1)+F(N-2). Return the result modulo 10⁹+7.

hidden_main.python:
import sys
def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.read().strip())
    print(f'RESULT:{fibonacci(n)}')
main()
